label: G12
headline: City Council approves over $1 million in new federal funding for improvements on Liberty Avenue.

label: G2
headline: Council introduces legislation to accept a $37,000 grant for investigating old sexual assault cases.

label: G15
headline: City Council approves $5.4 million in additional funding for the Liberty Avenue safety project.

label: G0
headline: Officials report fewer traffic deaths and new safety efforts in the first year of the Vision Zero program.

label: G17
headline: Council approves $93,000 for new vehicles and equipment for the Office of Community Health and Safety.

label: G25
headline: Pittsburgh to accept $450,000 state grant for enhanced lighting in the East Liberty business district.

label: G10
headline: City accepts $316,367 to settle lawsuit involving the Finland Street Pedestrian Bridge.

label: G13
headline: City Council approves $32,750 contract for police recruitment videos.

label: G8
headline: Council introduces a resolution to apply for a $250,000 state grant for the Emerald View Trail rehabilitation project.

label: G1
headline: City Council will ask the governor for state help with litter after removing a "state of emergency" request.

label: G18
headline: Council approves an additional $382,513 for the Haverhill stormwater and road project.

label: G7
headline: City Council introduces legislation to transfer 14 properties to the Larimer Consensus Group to settle multiple lawsuits.

label: G26
headline: Council recommends an additional $115,170 for design work on Fort Pitt Park improvements.

label: G16
headline: Council approves a contract increase of more than $317,000 for the South Negley Avenue Bridge Project.

label: G29
headline: Council recommends paying a $72,500 debt for 811 damage prevention calls.

label: G21
headline: A resolution for a $33,292 tuition reimbursement is held in committee.

label: G27
headline: Council committee recommends granting Duquesne Light and Pittsburgh Water use of city land for new utility equipment.

label: G23
headline: Council places a two-week hold on a $33,292 tuition reimbursement for an employee.

label: G9
headline: University of Pittsburgh would provide supplemental trash pickup in Oakland under a proposed agreement.

label: G3
headline: Council to consider granting Duquesne Light and Pittsburgh Water access to city land for utility upgrades.

label: G6
headline: City to be paid $8,200 for allowing ALCOSAN to build sewer tunnels under nine city properties.

label: G14
headline: City Council accepts a $250,000 state grant for the Smallman Street project.

label: G4
headline: Council reviews a sewage plan update for a new apartment building on McKee Place.

label: G19
headline: City Council authorizes an agreement with PennDOT to share road and bridge maintenance.

label: G24
headline: Proposed EMS student training partnership with the community college is held in committee.

label: G32
headline: Council recommends selling a URA-owned lot on Island Avenue for $3,600.

label: G11

label: G33
headline: Urban Redevelopment Authority to sell North Aiken Avenue property to the Pittsburgh Land Bank.

label: G5
headline: Council refers sewage plan for new South Side townhome development to committee.

label: G28
headline: Council approves a nearly $53,000 payment for a one-year subscription to the Pennsylvania Municipal League.

label: G31
headline: Two Hill District lots recommended for transfer to the Pittsburgh Land Bank.

headline: Council delays decision on sale of 23rd Ward property.

headline: The Urban Redevelopment Authority will no longer acquire a city-owned property in the 15th Ward.

label: G20
